enterprise.description: If set to true, the chart will be configured for enterprise use, This will enable additional features and configurations suitable for enterprise deployments.

existingKafkaConfigSecretName.description: is the name of an existing secret containing Kafka configuration

kafkaConfigProtocol.description: is the protocol used for Kafka communication

kafkaConfigMechanism.description: is the SASL mechanism used for Kafka authentication

kafkaConfigUsername.description: is the username for Kafka authentication

kafkaConfigPassword.description: is the password for Kafka authentication

appHostDomain.description: is the domain for the Telicent applications

authHostDomain.description: is the domain for the Telicent authentication service

jwksUrl.description: is the URL for the JSON Web Key Set (JWKS) used

kafkaBootstrapUrls.description: is the list of Kafka bootstrap URLs

appsGateway.description: is the name of the Istio gateway for applications

existingTruststoreSecretName.description: The name of an existing secret containing the truststore

mountPath.description: The mount path for the truststore in the container
